message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.IR 

The paper deals with the application of convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and capsule networks (CapsNets) for brain tumor classification based on MRI images. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of CapsNets also suggests the involvement of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a modified architecture for CapsNets, which involves the use of tumor coarse boundaries as extra inputs, indicating the involvement of information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
